import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export const Machine = () => { const { id } = useParams(); // console.log(useParams()) const [machine, setMachine] = React.useState({}) const [data, setData] = React.useState({}) const [general, setGeneral] = React.useState({}) const [operacion, setOperacion] = React.useState({}) const [clima, setClima] = React.useState({Temperatura}) React.useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) const fetchData = async () => { const data = await fetch(`https://wrk.acronex.com/api/challenge/machines/${id}`) const api = await data.json() setMachine(api) setData(api.data) setGeneral(api.data.General) setOperacion(api.data['OperaciÃ³n']) setClima("-") setClima(api.data.Clima) } clima['Temperatura'] = () => { if (this.item === undefined) { setClima(clima['Temperatura'] = "-"); } } return (
